text: Chinese Taipei participated at the 2015 Summer Universiade, in Gwangju, South Korea. Taipei being the host city of the 2017 Summer Universiade, a Taiwanese segment was performed at the closing ceremony. ==Medals by sport== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%" |- ! rowspan=2 |Sport ! colspan=4 |Grand Total |- ! !! !! !!
